title: Alpha Client Uninstalled Itself, Then After I Re-Installed It, It Won't Open
body: My Alpha Client uninstalled itself after working perfectly fine a few hours ago. I reinstalled it and now every time I try to open it, I get a Bugsplat error and it wont let me access the client. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Hey guys, we're talking about this on another [thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/40mtvFUG-client-just-uninstalled-itself-).

What you're seeing is the alpha client automatically updating to 6.22 open beta patch. As part of this update, we're replacing your old desktop icon with the one for the updated client. (Legacy client files are still on your computer) So after the updated, you should see only 1 icon on your desktop and it should launch the updated client. If for some reason you're still seeing the old icon, try refreshing your desktop.

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=uYzcq4AY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-09T23:34:33.212+0000)
>
> Hey guys, we're talking about this on another [thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/40mtvFUG-client-just-uninstalled-itself-).
> 
> What you're seeing is the alpha client automatically updating to 6.22 open beta patch. As part of this update, we're replacing your old desktop icon with the one for the updated client. (Legacy client files are still on your computer) So after the updated, you should see only 1 icon on your desktop and it should launch the updated client. If for some reason you're still seeing the old icon, try refreshing your desktop.

I deleted both league of legends clients and installed the client available client from the league of legends website, and it is still giving me the old client. This is not a big problem, I would just like to have the alpha client back some time.
Same thing happened to be, but I uninstalled league all together and installed it back again, and then install the new client.
Oh man I really dont want to have to do that i tried reinstalling alpha client and found in downloads (as per riot instructions) this got me nowhere
The regular client icon should launch the "new" client as of 6.22. If it's all busted, just reinstall the game and you should get the new client.
